abstract: Looking for a word to describe a period that is neither an adequate job generator nor a genuine contraction.
snippet: Looking for a word to describe a period that is neither an adequate job generator nor a genuine contraction.
lead_paragraph: By now, more than 27 months after the economy officially stopped shrinking and started to grow again, the word "recovery" is starting to look like an imprecise way - at best - to describe what's going on right now.
